title: I find that weekdays in the day time give me the best teammates
body:
I assume its because I am playing with other adults and not 12 year olds who are probably in school, who dont have to AFK because its dinner time. 

I seem to get fucked in matches at night time. And by fucked I mean, really REALLY bad feeding teammates, the likes of which I really don't see as much in the day time.

replies.body: Summer is a bad time to play, early in the morning between like 6am to 3pm (at least in my timezone) tend to be the best times to play. Holiday weekends are horrible as well. I've found that avoiding weekends is the best. Since Friday alone I've had at least three support Teemo's just in the last two or three days.

Beware of summer
No time is safe now!
